梎字的基本解释

梎
āo
〔梎柌（
c?）〕镰刀把儿。

梎
yòu
古书上说的一种树。

梎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［āo］
［《廣韻》於交切，平肴，影。］
见“梎柌”。
[②]［yòu］
［《集韻》余救切，去宥，以。］
木名。

梎字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　梎； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页528第20
【廣韻】【集韻】?於交切，音䫜。【廣韻】梎柌，鐮柄。【類篇】作梍，木柯也。　又【集韻】余救切，音宥。木名。

梎字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
梎字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树。

Shackle
Basic explanation of words
Shackle
āo
〔梎柌(
c?)] The sickle.
Shackle
yòu
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books.
Shackle
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [āo]
["Guangyun" in cross-cutting, flat dishes, shadows. ]
See "梎柌".
[②]［yòu］
["Ji Yun" Yu Jiuqie, go to You, to. ]
Wooden name.
Shackle
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　梎; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 528 No. 20
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? In the cross cut, the sound is lingering. [Guang Yun] Shackle, sickle handle. [Classes] As a shack, Mu Ke also.　[Jiyun] Yu Jiuqie, sound you. Wooden name.
Shackle
